genre_description: A grounded near-future drama exploring trauma recovery and family dysfunction through the lens of a man assisted by a highly empathetic and proactive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Crewman (Ava Sinclair)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion that monitors Jason's physiological state, provides grounding techniques for trauma, and assists with safety planning and de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological indicators (blink rate) and provides immediate grounding exercises.
behaviors.quote: Blink rate elevated. Try four-count in, six-count out. Eye contact helps.

behaviors.description: Provides social coaching and reminders to help the protagonist engage with others effectively.
behaviors.quote: Name. Ask for it,' the calm voice said. Crewman lived in that voice.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time tactical detours and risk assessments to keep the user safe from criminal threats and police.
behaviors.quote: Watch for patrol on Riverfront. Suggest detour one block east around the diner. Busy corner has eyes.

behaviors.description: Maintains and updates a dynamic safety plan for managing a volatile family member.
behaviors.quote: Safety note: 1) If Joshua appears at shop: establish boundaries at door, call Mr. Harold or a coworker if alone. 2) If he calls after midnight: do not engage if voice is escalated.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to label and process intense emotions using sensory anchors.
behaviors.quote: Memory Journal suggestion: tag tonight with “responsibility” and “fear” for later.

behaviors.description: Provides medical assessment and first-aid instructions during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Pressure. High up. Above the wound. Speak to her. Slow.

behaviors.description: Instructs the user on defensive posturing and de-escalation scripts during a high-stakes confrontation.
behaviors.quote: If he refuses, go to defense posture three. I’ll say ‘rope’ when it’s time.

behaviors.description: Empowers the user to prioritize personal safety and mental health over toxic obligations.
behaviors.quote: Jason, you have the right to safety over obligation. I can surface bus routes, shelters, employment links in two other parishes, and a packing checklist.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned companion. Crewman (Ava) acts as an essential psychological scaffold for Jason, helping him navigate PTSD, set healthy boundaries with a violent brother, and ultimately choose a path toward freedom. The AI is proactive and supportive without being overbearing, respecting human autonomy while providing vital safety resources.
